tables: CREATE TABLE user_account (user_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT UNIQUE, user_email VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY, user_name VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, user_password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, user_group_id INT, user_role INT)

CREATE TABLE exercise_log (record_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT UNIQUE, user_id INT, exercise_name VARCHAR(255), description VARCHAR(255), number_of_set INT, status VARCHAR(10), priority INT, start_time TIMESTAMP, end_time TIMESTAMP, total_time INT, PRIMARY KEY (record_id))
ALTER TABLE exercise_log ADD CONSTRAINT fk_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_account(user_id)
CREATE TABLE exercises (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), type VARCHAR(50), duration INT, user_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_account(user_id))
